casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eddie Lamar TAYLOR. No. 719A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 2, 2008. Daniel Shatz, Anne Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Eddie Taylor. William Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Susan Doyle, District Attorney, Daniel P. O'Brien, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the third motion filed on the 21st day of December 2007 by State of NC for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 18th day of January 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with *377this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of January 2008."
